attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Des Brown is clealry not suited to be armed forces minister when he is so disloyal to our armed forces undergoing such hardships and conflicts which the Labout Government have commited them too.  Perhaps even Gordon Brown should also consider resigning too.  Actualy, why is there so many Scottish Labour MPs running the UK, is this not disproportional?  It is alright for the Labour party to set Gender targets and ethnic targets, but they dont include this when goverment is concerned, dictatorship springs to mind.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
